Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: RKM MSSQL
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION This KM retrieves the table, view and synonym structures in SQL Server. It also retrieves columns, primary keys, and references. Columns with user defined data types will be reversed and saved as SQL Server native data types in ODI model.
REQUIREMENTS Required privileges for the connection user: SELECT on any INFORMATION_SCHEMA views (eg. INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES)
LIMITATIONS - Only native data type will be saved for the column with user defined data type in the repository and model. - User defined data types implemented through a class of assembly in the Microsoft .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) will not be reversed.
Only Microsoft SQLServer version 2005 and above support synonyms. This option decides whether to enable reverse synonyms.

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN (MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_CATALOG, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE) values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :FK_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, 'D' , :CATALOG_NAME, :SCHEMA_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '1')

select fktable.TABLE_SCHEMA FK_USER_NAME, fktable.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, fktable.CONSTRAINT_NAME FK_NAME, pktable.TABLE_SCHEMA PK_USER_NAME, pktable.TABLE_NAME PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>' CATALOG_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS fks, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS pktable, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS fktable where fktable.TABLE_CATALOG = '<%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>' and fktable.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fktable.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pktable.TABLE_CATALOG = '<%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>' and pktable.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and pktable.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pktable.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG = fks.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_CATALOG and pktable.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = fks.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and pktable.CONSTRAINT_NAME = fks.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_NAME and pktable.CONSTRAINT_TYPE in ('PRIMARY KEY', 'UNIQUE') and fktable.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG = fks.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG and fktable.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = fks.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and fktable.CONSTRAINT_NAME = fks.CONSTRAINT_NAME and fktable.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = ('FOREIGN KEY')

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL (MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS) Values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :FK_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :POS)

select fkto.name FK_TABLE_NAME, pkto.name PK_TABLE_NAME, fko.name FK_NAME, substring(fkco.name,1,35) FK_COL_NAME, pkco.name PK_COL_NAME, fkco.colorder POS from <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..sysreferences sf, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..syscolumns pkco, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..syscolumns fkco, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..sysobjects fkto, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..sysobjects fko, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..sysobjects pkto where sf.rkeyid = pkto.id and sf.fkeyid = fkto.id and schema_name(fkto.uid) = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fkto.name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and schema_name(pkto.uid) = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and pkto.name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and fko.id = sf.constid and pkco.id = sf.rkeyid and fkco.id = sf.fkeyid and ((pkco.colid=rkey1 and fkco.colid=fkey1) or (pkco.colid=rkey2 and fkco.colid=fkey2) or (pkco.colid=rkey3 and fkco.colid=fkey3) or (pkco.colid=rkey4 and fkco.colid=fkey4) or (pkco.colid=rkey5 and fkco.colid=fkey5) or (pkco.colid=rkey6 and fkco.colid=fkey6) or (pkco.colid=rkey7 and fkco.colid=fkey7) or (pkco.colid=rkey8 and fkco.colid=fkey8) or (pkco.colid=rkey9 and fkco.colid=fkey9) or (pkco.colid=rkey10 and fkco.colid=fkey10) or (pkco.colid=rkey11 and fkco.colid=fkey11) or (pkco.colid=rkey12 and fkco.colid=fkey12) or (pkco.colid=rkey13 and fkco.colid=fkey13) or (pkco.colid=rkey14 and fkco.colid=fkey14) or (pkco.colid=rkey15 and fkco.colid=fkey15) or (pkco.colid=rkey16 and fkco.colid=fkey16))

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL (MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS) Values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :FK_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :POS)

select S.NAME FK_TABLE_NAME, pkto.name PK_TABLE_NAME, S.NAME+'.'+fko.name FK_NAME, substring(fkco.name,1,35) FK_COL_NAME, pkco.name PK_COL_NAME, fkco.colorder POS from <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..sysreferences sf, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..syscolumns pkco, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..syscolumns fkco, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..sysobjects fkto, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..sysobjects fko, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>..sysobjects pkto, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.sys.synonyms S where sf.rkeyid = pkto.id and sf.fkeyid = fkto.id and fko.id = sf.constid and pkco.id = sf.rkeyid and fkco.id = sf.fkeyid and ((pkco.colid=rkey1 and fkco.colid=fkey1) or (pkco.colid=rkey2 and fkco.colid=fkey2) or (pkco.colid=rkey3 and fkco.colid=fkey3) or (pkco.colid=rkey4 and fkco.colid=fkey4) or (pkco.colid=rkey5 and fkco.colid=fkey5) or (pkco.colid=rkey6 and fkco.colid=fkey6) or (pkco.colid=rkey7 and fkco.colid=fkey7) or (pkco.colid=rkey8 and fkco.colid=fkey8) or (pkco.colid=rkey9 and fkco.colid=fkey9) or (pkco.colid=rkey10 and fkco.colid=fkey10) or (pkco.colid=rkey11 and fkco.colid=fkey11) or (pkco.colid=rkey12 and fkco.colid=fkey12) or (pkco.colid=rkey13 and fkco.colid=fkey13) or (pkco.colid=rkey14 and fkco.colid=fkey14) or (pkco.colid=rkey15 and fkco.colid=fkey15) or (pkco.colid=rkey16 and fkco.colid=fkey16)) and S.TYPE = 'SN' and S.NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and schema_name(S.schema_id) = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and S.base_object_name = '['+'<%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>'+'].['+user_name(fkto.uid)+'].['+fkto.name+']' and PATINDEX('%;SY;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_KEY (MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT) Values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

Select cons.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, CASE cons.CONSTRAINT_TYPE WHEN 'PRIMARY KEY' then 'PK' ELSE 'AK' END CONS_TYPE, cons.CONSTRAINT_NAME KEY_NAME From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS cons Where cons.CONSTRAINT_TYPE in ('PRIMARY KEY', 'UNIQUE') and cons.TABLE_CATALOG = '<%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>' /* Qualifier (database name) */ and cons.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' /* Owner of tables */ and cons.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' /* Mask of tables to reverse */

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '1', '1')

select col.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, col.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, CASE WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'varchar(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'varchar' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'nvarchar(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'nvarchar' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'varbinary(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'varbinary' ELSE col.DATA_TYPE END DT_DRIVER, col.ORDINAL_POSITION POS, CASE WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,0) + ISNULL(col.NUMERIC_PRECISION,0) END LONGC, col.NUMERIC_SCALE SCALEC, CASE substring(col.IS_NULLABLE, 1, 1) When 'N' Then '1' Else '0' End COL_MANDATORY from <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS col, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES tab where col.TABLE_CATALOG = tab.TABLE_CATALOG and col.TABLE_SCHEMA = tab.TABLE_SCHEMA and col.TABLE_NAME = tab.TABLE_NAME and col.TABLE_SCHEMA like '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ((tab.TABLE_TYPE = 'VIEW') and (tab.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>')) and PATINDEX('%;V;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN (MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE) values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :FK_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, 'D' , :SCHEMA_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '1')

select fktable.TABLE_SCHEMA FK_USER_NAME, S.NAME TABLE_NAME, S.NAME+'.'+fktable.CONSTRAINT_NAME FK_NAME, pktable.TABLE_SCHEMA PK_USER_NAME, pktable.TABLE_NAME PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS fks, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS pktable, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS fktable, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.sys.synonyms S where fktable.TABLE_CATALOG = pktable.TABLE_CATALOG and fktable.TABLE_SCHEMA = pktable.TABLE_SCHEMA and fktable.TABLE_NAME = pktable.TABLE_NAME and pktable.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG = fks.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_CATALOG and pktable.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = fks.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and pktable.CONSTRAINT_NAME = fks.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_NAME and pktable.CONSTRAINT_TYPE in ('PRIMARY KEY', 'UNIQUE') and fktable.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG = fks.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG and fktable.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = fks.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and fktable.CONSTRAINT_NAME = fks.CONSTRAINT_NAME and fktable.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = ('FOREIGN KEY') and S.TYPE = 'SN' and S.NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and schema_name(S.schema_id) = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and S.base_object_name = '['+pktable.TABLE_CATALOG+'].['+pktable.TABLE_SCHEMA+'].['+pktable.TABLE_NAME+']' and PATINDEX('%;SY;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_KEY (MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT) Values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

Select S.NAME TABLE_NAME, CASE cons.CONSTRAINT_TYPE WHEN 'PRIMARY KEY' then 'PK' ELSE 'AK' END CONS_TYPE, cons.CONSTRAINT_NAME KEY_NAME From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS cons, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.sys.synonyms S Where cons.CONSTRAINT_TYPE in ('PRIMARY KEY', 'UNIQUE') and S.TYPE = 'SN' and S.NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and schema_name(S.schema_id) = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and S.base_object_name = '['+cons.TABLE_CATALOG+'].['+cons.TABLE_SCHEMA+'].['+cons.TABLE_NAME+']' and PATINDEX('%;SY;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS) Values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS)

Select cols.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, cols.CONSTRAINT_NAME KEY_NAME, cols.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, cols.ORDINAL_POSITION POS From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS cons, /* All Constraints */ <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE cols /* All column constraints */ Where cons.CONSTRAINT_TYPE in ('PRIMARY KEY', 'UNIQUE') and cols.TABLE_CATALOG = '<%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>' and cols.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and cols.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' /* Join the two tables */ and cons.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG = cols.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG and cons.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = cols.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and cons.CONSTRAINT_NAME = cols.CONSTRAINT_NAME
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS) Values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS)

Select S.NAME TABLE_NAME, cols.CONSTRAINT_NAME KEY_NAME, cols.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, cols.ORDINAL_POSITION POS From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS cons, /* All Constraints */ <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE cols, /* All column constraints */ <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.sys.synonyms S Where cons.CONSTRAINT_TYPE in ('PRIMARY KEY', 'UNIQUE') and cons.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG = cols.CONSTRAINT_CATALOG and cons.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA = cols.CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA and cons.CONSTRAINT_NAME = cols.CONSTRAINT_NAME and S.TYPE = 'SN' and S.NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and schema_name(S.schema_id) = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and S.base_object_name = '['+cols.TABLE_CATALOG+'].['+cols.TABLE_SCHEMA+'].['+cols.TABLE_NAME+']' and PATINDEX('%;SY;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0
insert into SNP_REV_TABLE (MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, IND_SHOW) values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_TYPE, '1')

Select T.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, T.TABLE_NAME RES_NAME, REPLACE(T.TABLE_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, 'T' TABLE_TYPE From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES T where T.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and T.TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and T.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and PATINDEX('%;T;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0
<% if ("2000".equals(odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE"))) {%>
<% } else { %> UNION
Select S.NAME TABLE_NAME, S.NAME RES_NAME, REPLACE(S.NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, 'SY' TABLE_TYPE From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.sys.synonyms S where schema_name(S.schema_id) = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and S.TYPE = 'SN' and S.NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and PATINDEX('%;SY;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0 <% } %>
Insert into SNP_REV_TABLE (MOD_GUID,TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS,TABLE_TYPE, IND_SHOW) Values ('<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME,:RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'V', '1')

Select T.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, T.TABLE_NAME RES_NAME, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(T.TABLE_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>',''),1,3) TABLE_ALIAS From <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES T where T.TABLE_SCHEMA = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and T.TABLE_TYPE = 'VIEW' and T.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and PATINDEX('%;V;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC_C, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '1', '1')

select col.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, col.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, CASE WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'varchar(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'varchar' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'nvarchar(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'nvarchar' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'varbinary(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'varbinary' ELSE col.DATA_TYPE END DT_DRIVER, col.DOMAIN_NAME COL_DESC, col.ORDINAL_POSITION POS, CASE WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,0) + ISNULL(col.NUMERIC_PRECISION,0) END LONGC, col.NUMERIC_SCALE SCALEC, CASE substring(col.IS_NULLABLE, 1, 1) When 'N' Then '1' Else '0' End COL_MANDATORY from <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS col, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES tab where col.TABLE_CATALOG = tab.TABLE_CATALOG and col.TABLE_SCHEMA = tab.TABLE_SCHEMA and col.TABLE_NAME = tab.TABLE_NAME and col.TABLE_SCHEMA like '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ((tab.TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE') and (tab.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>')) and PATINDEX('%;T;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC_C, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '1', '1')

select S.NAME TABLE_NAME, col.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, CASE WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'varchar(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'varchar' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'nvarchar(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'nvarchar' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN 'varbinary(max)' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >= 1 THEN 'varbinary' ELSE col.DATA_TYPE END DT_DRIVER, col.DOMAIN_NAME COL_DESC, col.ORDINAL_POSITION POS, CASE WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' WHEN col.DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' and col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1 THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(col.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,0) + ISNULL(col.NUMERIC_PRECISION,0) END LONGC, col.NUMERIC_SCALE SCALEC, CASE substring(col.IS_NULLABLE, 1, 1) When 'N' Then '1' Else '0' End COL_MANDATORY from <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS col, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES tab, <%=odiRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>.sys.synonyms S where col.TABLE_CATALOG = tab.TABLE_CATALOG and col.TABLE_SCHEMA = tab.TABLE_SCHEMA and col.TABLE_NAME = tab.TABLE_NAME and tab.TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and S.TYPE = 'SN' and S.NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and schema_name(S.schema_id) = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and (S.base_object_name = '['+tab.TABLE_CATALOG+'].['+tab.TABLE_SCHEMA+'].['+tab.TABLE_NAME+']' or S.base_object_name = '['+tab.TABLE_SCHEMA+'].['+tab.TABLE_NAME+']' or (S.base_object_name = '['+tab.TABLE_NAME+']' and tab.table_schema = schema_name(S.schema_id))) and PATINDEX('%;SY;%', ';'+'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'+';') > 0
Get Columns for Synonyms from different db - start

srcCx = odiRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC") srcCatalog= '<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_CATALOG")%>' srcSchema ='<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_SCHEMA")%>'
trgCx = odiRef.getJDBCConnection("DEST") imod = '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>' tabpat = [ '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>', '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>', '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>' ]
logger = odiRef.getLogger() rev.initialize(imod, (String[])tabpat.toArray(), srcCx, srcCatalog,srcSchema, trgCx, logger) rev.startReverse() rev.endReverse()
srcCx.close() trgCx.close()
Get Columns for Synonyms from different db - prepare
